templates.description: Create captive portals compliant with Wi-Fi legislation and collect data.

env.description: Release version
env.label: Release
env.name: PRODUCT_VERSION

env.description: Licence server
env.label: Release
env.name: LICENCE_SERVER

env.description: Timezone that will be used by the application
env.label: Timezone
env.name: TZ

env.description: Please keep the password for further use.
env.label: MySQL Database Root Password*
env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD

env.description: Your Company Name (without spaces nor special chars).
env.label: Operator*
env.name: OPERATOR

env.description: This is the hostname that will be used with the domain to generate all the URL of the server.
env.label: Server Name*
env.name: HM_SERVER_NAME

env.description: i.e. adipsys.com
env.label: Domain*
env.name: HM_URL_SUFFIX

env.description: If empty, default port is chosen.
env.label: Web interface HTTP port (TCP)
env.name: WEB_IHM_PORT

env.description: If empty, default port is chosen.
env.label: Web interface HTTPS port (TCP)
env.name: WEB_IHM_SSL_PORT

env.description: If empty, default port is chosen.
env.label: Radius authentication port (UDP)
env.name: RADIUS_AUTH_PORT

env.description: If empty, default port is chosen.
env.label: Radius accounting port (UDP)
env.name: RADIUS_ACC_PORT

env.description: If empty, default port is chosen.
env.label: Loghost port (UDP)
env.name: LOGHOST_PORT

env.description: If you need a secondary URL for your Hotspot.
env.label: Hotspot URL Alias
env.name: HOTSPOT_ALIAS1

env.description: If you need a secondary URL for your Admin interface.
env.label: Admin URL Alias
env.name: ADMIN_ALIAS1

env.description: If you need to send logs on another server (ie. LOGview).
env.label: Loghost
env.name: RSYSLOG_SERVER

templates.note: Adipsys HotspotManager : Please read documentation on http://docs.adipsys.com. You can open a ticket at https://support.adipsys.com
templates.title: HotspotManager

templates.description: Securize Wi-Fi connection: protect users by filtering malicious/illegal contents.

env.description: Release version
env.label: Release
env.name: PRODUCT_VERSION

env.description: Please keep the password for further use.
env.label: MySQL Database Root Password*
env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD

env.description: This is the URL of the Admin interface (has also to be set onto your DNS)
env.label: Server URL*
env.name: SERVER_NAME

env.description: If you wish to use a secondary name or a wildcard (has also to be set onto your DNS)
env.label: Server Alias
env.name: SERVER_ALIAS

env.description: Use account : admin
env.label: Administration interface password
env.name: ADMIN_PASSWD

env.description: If empty, default port is chosen. (it is not advised to use a different port)
env.label: Web interface HTTP port (TCP)
env.name: WEB_IHM_PORT

env.description: If empty, default port is chosen.
env.label: Web interface HTTPS port (TCP)
env.name: WEB_IHM_SSL_PORT

env.description: If empty, default port is chosen. (it is not advised to use a different port)
env.label: DNS server port (UDP)
env.name: DNS_PORT

env.description: If you need to send logs on another server (ie. LOGview).
env.label: Loghost
env.name: RSYSLOG_SERVER

templates.note: Adipsys DNSprotect : Please read documentation on http://docs.adipsys.com. You can open a ticket at https://support.adipsys.com
templates.title: DNSprotect

templates.description: Solution to trace Wi-Fi and handle the mandatory storage of legal logs.

env.description: Release version
env.label: Release
env.name: PRODUCT_VERSION

env.description: Your Company Name (without spaces nor special chars).
env.label: Operator*
env.name: OPERATOR

env.description: This is the URL or the Name of the server for Adipsys registration.
env.label: Server Name*
env.name: LOGVIEW_NAME

env.description: This password will have to be initialized on elastic.
env.label: elastic account*
env.name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD

env.description: This password will have to be initialized on elastic.
env.label: kibana_system account*
env.name: KIBANA_PASSWORD

env.description: If empty, default port is chosen.
env.label: Web interface HTTP port (TCP)
env.name: WEB_IHM_PORT

templates.note: Adipsys LOGview : Please read documentation on http://docs.adipsys.com. You can open a ticket at https://support.adipsys.com . Please run once : bin/elasticsearch-setup-passwords interactive to set credentials.
templates.title: LOGview
